channel.title: How do I decrypt password [317]
channel.description: Well i found an old source on my computer, I want to use my owner account that has all my items but I forgot the password how do I decrypt it?

item.title: How do I decrypt password [317]
item.dc:creator: @ImNoHacker ImNoHacker
item.description:
@ImNoHacker wrote:

LOL. You can just go into your character files and delete your password. If its encrypted. Then just highlight it, and delte it. Ctrl+s to save and then go sign in using a blank password. Then once in use ::changepassword new pass. easyness.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I decrypt password [317]
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

copy everything except the name and pass, delete it
make an account in that name, then paste what u have, where it belongs

How do I remove the password check in login?

item.title: How do I decrypt password [317]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

iLuckyBeaTz:

Well i found an old source on my computer, I want to use my owner account that has all my items but I forgot the password how do I decrypt it?

There is no reason to.

If you want, you can remove the password checking on login, and still be able to play.

Or you can attempt to reverse the encryption. If itâ€™s MD5, no problem. But if the programmer was intelligent, they would have created a random salt for each user, hashed the password with the salt, and stored the hashed value.

Read full topic
